title: Torque - force diagram with maximum net torque

content.question: A rod is free to rotate about its center. Two forces of equal magnitude can be exerted perpendicular to the rod. Which of the following force diagrams shows the situation with the maximum magnitude of the net torque exerted on the rod about its center by the two forces?

choices.label: The figure shows a force diagram with a horizontal rod in a grid. Two arrows are drawn. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 3 grid units to the left of center. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 1 grid unit to the right of center.

The figure shows a force diagram with a horizontal rod in a grid. Two arrows are drawn. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 4 grid units to the left of center. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 4 grid units to the right of center.

The figure shows a force diagram with a horizontal rod in a grid. Two arrows are drawn. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 1 grid unit to the left of center. One arrow extends 2 grid units down from a point located 2 grid units to the right of center.

The figure shows a force diagram with a horizontal rod in a grid. Two arrows are drawn. One arrow extends 2 grid units down from a point located 1 grid unit to the left of center. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 1 grid unit to the right of center.

content.answer: The figure shows a force diagram with a horizontal rod in a grid. Two arrows are drawn. One arrow extends 2 grid units up from a point located 1 grid unit to the left of center. One arrow extends 2 grid units down from a point located 2 grid units to the right of center.
